briefTitle: A Long-Term Extension Trial From Phase II/III of SPM 962 in Early Parkinson's Disease Patients
officialTitle: An Open-label Long-term Extension Trial From Phase II/III of SPM962 (243-07-001) in Early Parkinson's Disease Patients With Non-concomitant Treatment of L-dopa
summary: Safety of SPM 962 in a once-daily repeated long-term treatment in Parkinson's disease patients who are not concomitantly treated with L-dopa will be investigated with a doses.

primaryOutcome.measure: Incidence and Severity of Adverse Events, Vital Signs, and Laboratory Parameters
